attributes.action: Pass a law making silly hat wearing compulsory  on Fridays.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hats must be silly. Prime minister must wear silly hats at least 5 days a week. 

Failure to wear a hat will result in your head being shaved. Bald people will be polished.

Ms Jill Judson inspired this 23/02/07 (she likes hats).

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
